entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 2 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Fog patches. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 8. POP 60%
